How to use the Baldur's Gate 3 Interactive Map

The search bar matches partial words so you can try to put "weapon" or "quest" and see what comes up. You can filter by category using the checkmark layers on the right side of the map. Please see our Walkthrough and Game Progress Route to figure out where to go! VIP USERS: PROGRESS TRACKER: Now live for ALL DEVICES!
